title: A field of experts model for optic cup and disc segmentation from retinal fundus images
excerpt: ABSTRACT We present a Field of Experts (FoE) model to segment the optic cup and disc from retinal fundus images. FoE learns a prior model of the cup and neuro-retinal rim region in the form of filters, without relying on hand crafted features. FoE filter responses are  ...
